segments.text: I’m just watching this kitchen scene unfold, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing there, diligently drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s completely focused on that dish, her attention unwavering.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't believe she doesn't notice the sink is actively overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing from the faucet and pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s making a significant puddle on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In fact, one of her feet is already submerged in the water!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so utterly unaware of the growing flood around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole area is getting soaked, and it makes me feel quite disgusted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm afraid she might slip and fall at any moment on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water must be damaging the cabinets too, which is a bit sad to see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a very calm scene, yet so much is going wrong right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR
